directions: Stir 1/4 cup hot pepper sauce, butter and dressing mix in heavy medium saucepan over low heat until sauce is smooth; add more hot sauce, if desired. Arrange roll bottoms on plates. Top each with lettuce leaf and 2 tablespoons sauce.

Sprinkle chicken with salt; dust lightly with flour, then brush generously with remaining sauce. Dust lightly with flour again. Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add chicken; sauté until brown and cooked through, about 5 minutes per side.
Complete sandwiches with chicken, blue cheese dressing and roll tops.
ingredients: 1 0.6-ounce envelope dry Italian salad dressing mix
4 boneless chicken breast halves with skin
title: Buffalo Chicken Sandwiches
